TestClientPageLifecycleEvents
open /SystemWebExtensionsAUT/ClientPageLifecycleEvents.aspx
verifyText //legend Update Panel1
storeText LastUpdate LastUpdateString
verifyText div1 No Events
pause 1500
click Button1
waitForNotText LastUpdate ${LastUpdateString}
click //input[@value='Add Handlers']
click Button1
waitForText div1 exact:InitializeRequest:BeginRequest:PageLoading:PageLoaded:EndRequest:
click //input[@value='Clear']
verifyText div1 No Events
click //input[@value='Add Handlers']
click Button1
waitForText div1 exact:InitializeRequest:InitializeRequest:BeginRequest:BeginRequest:PageLoading:PageLoading:PageLoaded:PageLoaded:EndRequest:EndRequest:
click //input[@value='Remove Handlers']
click //input[@value='Clear']
verifyText div1 No Events
click Button1
waitForText div1 exact:InitializeRequest:BeginRequest:PageLoading:PageLoaded:EndRequest:
click //input[@value='Clear']
click //input[@value='Remove Handlers']
verifyText div1 No Events
click Button1
waitForText div1 No Events
